author: potuz
content: <@688748669268132001> didn't want to pollute your issue and turn it into a chat. But you should be careful benchmarking lighthouse. They warm a cache and parallelize the hashing also. When I benchmarked them, Sproul wrote a function that allowed me to check from a cold start and without parallelization
